title: Short-Intensive Course for Enhancing Teaching Coaching and Assessment Competencies in Higher Education Science Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Higher education field experience (3+ years) and foundational knowledge of instructional design
context.additional_context: Teaching competency improvement program for current science field practitioners. Emphasis on real-time feedback and peer collaborative learning using digital tools

learning_goals: Participants can evaluate and analyze peers' lecture videos with over 80% accuracy by applying an instructional coaching model.
Participants can design learner-centered feedback tools using three formative assessment techniques.
Participants can derive five indicators of instructional effectiveness linked to the institution's educational goals
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
